title: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead
description: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead (CDDA) is an open-source survival horror roguelike video game. Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead is a fork of the original game Cataclysm.

metadata.title: Metadata Category
metadata.description: This is a category of descriptive name-value pairs

template.title: List of templates
template.description: This is the factory template category

1-of-material.title: Pick one of material
1-of-material.description: Prints one of the listed materials

any-percent.title: Pick one percent
any-percent.description: Prints a text like '36 percent' and such

2-of-savagery.title: Pick two from savagery
2-of-savagery.description: Prints a text like 'Serene, Calm' and such

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: A suggestion what rules to apply to your gameplay

sequence.raw: If anything could possibly be made out of
, then build it out of it.
Start in any way you want, but expel 6 of your seven dwarfs and run the fort on your own.
